relation: Gets or sets a security action. (Inherited from SecurityAttribute.)
Gets or sets a path to an Active Directory Domain Services node to which the permissions apply.
Gets or sets the access levels that are used in creating permissions.
When implemented in a derived class, gets a unique identifier for this Attribute. (Inherited from Attribute.)
Gets or sets a value indicating whether full (unrestricted) permission to the resource protected by the attribute is declared. (Inherited from SecurityAttribute.)
